UtInstanceOfMatcher
UtTypedMatcher
UtInstanceOfMatcher
Functions
ut instance of
ut instance of(
class object 
)

Factory function for UtInstanceOfMatcher.

Checks if actual value is a class object of a specific type.

Note: this matcher does not check base class names.  You may need to use duck typing and create your own matcher for this purpose.

Arguments
value

string of class name

Examples
Define Class("Foo");
ut assert that( Expr( New Object( "Foo" ) ), ut instance of( "Foo" ) );
